dcterms:creator: G. Garcia-Hernando
S. Yuan
S. Baek
T.-K. Kim
dcterms:description: The FPHA dataset includes 1175 skeletons belonging to 45 action categories with variations in style, speed, scale, and viewpoint. Each video is described with a graph where nodes correspond to hand-joint trajectories and edges represent spatial connections between these trajectories.
dcterms:title: FPHA dataset
